mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO seckilldb.seckill_success (goods_id, user_phone) VALUES (#{goodsId}, #{userPhone})
mapper.select: SELECT ss.goods_id, ss.user_phone, ss.create_time, ss.state, sg.goods_id, sg.name, sg.quantity, sg.start_time, sg.end_time, sg.create_time FROM seckilldb.seckill_success ss,seckilldb.seckill_goods sg WHERE ss.goods_id=sg.goods_id AND ss.goods_id = #{goodsId} AND ss.user_phone = #{userPhone}
